name: Pilot
quot: The wolf thought to himself, what a tender young creature. What a nice plump mouthful ...

name: Bears will be Bears
quot: She looked in the window, and then peeped through the keyhole; seeing nobody in the house, she lifted the latch.

name: Beeware
quot: She'll sting you one day. Oh, ever so gently, so you hardly even feel it. 'Til you fall dead.

name: Lonelyhearts
quot: There she paused for a while thinling... but the temptation was so great that she could not conquer it.

name: Danse Macabre
quot: Out they scampered from doors, windows, and gutters, rats of every size, all after the piper.

name: The Three Bad Wolves
quot: "Little pig, little pig, let me come in," said the wolf to the pig."Not by the hair of my chinny chin chin," said the pig to the wolf.

name: Let Yout Hair Down
quot: The enchantress was so hard-hearted that she banished the poor girl to a wilderness, where she had to live in a miserable, wretched state.

name: Came Ogre
quot: Fee fi fo fum i smell the blood of an Englishmen...

name: Of Mouse and Man
quot: I am impelled not to squeak like a grateful and frightened mouse, but to roar...

name: Organ Grinder
quot: We shall see the crumbs of bread... and they will show us our way home again.

name: Tarantella
quot: Instantly, the priestess changed into a monstrous goblin-spider and the warrior found himself caught fast in her web.

name: Last Grimm Standing
quot: The beasts were loosed into the arena, and among them, a beast of huge bulk and ferocious aspect. Then the slave was cast in.

name: Three Coins in a Fuchsbau
quot: For me there are neither locks nor bolts, whatsoever I desire is mine.
